pullRequest.title: [RESTEASY-2686] Prepare TS profile for bootable jar testing
pullRequest.bodyText:
RESTEasy jira with some additional details: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/RESTEASY-2686
I will also port this to RESTEasy 3.13 once WFLY-13803 will be merged

nodes.bodyText: What is -Dserver.home used for when testing Bootable JAR?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -90,6 +90,12 @@ the usage of `standalone-microprofile.xml` configuration file:
 
 > mvn clean verify -Dserver.home=PATH_TO_WIDLFLY_HOME -Dts.standalone.microprofile
 
+### Bootable jar testing
+Run testsuite or test against Bootable jar, not against Wildfly:
+
+> mvn clean verify -Dts.bootable -Ddefault=false -Ddisable.microprofile.tests -Dserver.version=21.0.0.Beta1-SNAPSHOT -Dserver.home=placeholder

nodes.bodyText: When moving to wildfly-jar-maven-plugin:2.0.0.Beta4 this will have to be removed.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -203,6 +203,152 @@
                 <microprofile.excluded.groups>org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingWithStandaloneMicroprofileConfiguration,org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingBecauseOfSmallRyeMicroprofileOpenApi11</microprofile.excluded.groups>
             </properties>
         </profile>
+
+        <profile>
+            <id>bootablejar.profile</id>
+            <activation>
+                <property>
+                    <name>ts.bootable</name>
+                </property>
+            </activation>
+            <build>
+                <plugins>
+                    <!-- Disable the standard copy-based provisioning -->
+                    <plugin>
+                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+                        <executions>
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>initialize-basedirs</id>
+                                <phase>none</phase>
+                                <goals>
+                                    <goal>run</goal>
+                                </goals>
+                            </execution>
+                        </executions>
+                    </plugin>
+                    <plugin>
+                        <groupId>org.wildfly.plugins</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>wildfly-jar-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+                        <executions>
+                            <!-- Package a datasources-web-server with observability decorator added -->
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>bootable-jar-observability-packaging</id>
+                                <goals>
+                                    <goal>package</goal>
+                                </goals>
+                                <phase>process-test-resources</phase>
+                                <configuration>
+                                    <output-file-name>jaxrs-server.jar</output-file-name>
+                                    <hollowJar>true</hollowJar>
+                                    <record-state>false</record-state>
+                                    <log-time>true</log-time>
+                                    <offline>true</offline>
+                                    <plugin-options>
+                                        <jboss-maven-dist/>
+                                        <jboss-fork-embedded>true</jboss-fork-embedded>
+                                    </plugin-options>
+                                    <feature-packs>
+                                        <feature-pack>
+                                            <groupId>org.wildfly</groupId>
+                                            <artifactId>wildfly-galleon-pack</artifactId>
+                                            <version>${server.version}</version>
+                                            <inherit-configs>false</inherit-configs>

nodes.bodyText: When moving to wildfly-jar-maven-plugin:2.0.0.Beta4 this will have to be removed.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -203,6 +203,152 @@
                 <microprofile.excluded.groups>org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingWithStandaloneMicroprofileConfiguration,org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingBecauseOfSmallRyeMicroprofileOpenApi11</microprofile.excluded.groups>

         </profile>
+

+                    <!-- Disable the standard copy-based provisioning -->

+                        <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>

+                                <id>initialize-basedirs</id>

+                                <goals>
+                                    <goal>run</goal>
+                                </goals>

+                    </plugin>

+                        <executions>
+                            <!-- Package a datasources-web-server with observability decorator added -->

+                                            <version>${server.version}</version>
+                                            <inherit-configs>false</inherit-configs>
+                                            <inherit-packages>false</inherit-packages>

nodes.bodyText: I see different configuration with respect to the observability layer which was mentioned in the comment above. Am I missing something?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -203,6 +203,152 @@
                 <microprofile.excluded.groups>org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingWithStandaloneMicroprofileConfiguration,org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingBecauseOfSmallRyeMicroprofileOpenApi11</microprofile.excluded.groups>
             </properties>
         </profile>
+
+        <profile>
+            <id>bootablejar.profile</id>
+            <activation>
+                <property>
+                    <name>ts.bootable</name>
+                </property>
+            </activation>
+            <build>
+                <plugins>
+                    <!-- Disable the standard copy-based provisioning -->
+                    <plugin>
+                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+                        <executions>
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>initialize-basedirs</id>
+                                <phase>none</phase>
+                                <goals>
+                                    <goal>run</goal>
+                                </goals>
+                            </execution>
+                        </executions>
+                    </plugin>
+                    <plugin>
+                        <groupId>org.wildfly.plugins</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>wildfly-jar-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+                        <executions>
+                            <!-- Package a datasources-web-server with observability decorator added -->
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>bootable-jar-observability-packaging</id>
+                                <goals>
+                                    <goal>package</goal>
+                                </goals>
+                                <phase>process-test-resources</phase>
+                                <configuration>
+                                    <output-file-name>jaxrs-server.jar</output-file-name>
+                                    <hollowJar>true</hollowJar>
+                                    <record-state>false</record-state>
+                                    <log-time>true</log-time>
+                                    <offline>true</offline>
+                                    <plugin-options>
+                                        <jboss-maven-dist/>
+                                        <jboss-fork-embedded>true</jboss-fork-embedded>
+                                    </plugin-options>
+                                    <feature-packs>
+                                        <feature-pack>
+                                            <groupId>org.wildfly</groupId>
+                                            <artifactId>wildfly-galleon-pack</artifactId>
+                                            <version>${server.version}</version>
+                                            <inherit-configs>false</inherit-configs>
+                                            <inherit-packages>false</inherit-packages>
+                                        </feature-pack>
+                                    </feature-packs>
+                                    <layers>
+                                        <layer>jaxrs-server</layer>

nodes.bodyText: is wildfly-arquillian-container-remote no longer used at all?

nodes.bodyText: @marekkopecky shouldnt this be parametrized as well, to be able to use other distros? E.g. EAP or EAP XP?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -203,6 +203,150 @@
                 <microprofile.excluded.groups>org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingWithStandaloneMicroprofileConfiguration,org.jboss.resteasy.category.ExpectedFailingBecauseOfSmallRyeMicroprofileOpenApi11</microprofile.excluded.groups>
             </properties>
         </profile>
+
+        <profile>
+            <id>bootablejar.profile</id>
+            <activation>
+                <property>
+                    <name>ts.bootable</name>
+                </property>
+            </activation>
+            <build>
+                <plugins>
+                    <!-- Disable the standard copy-based provisioning -->
+                    <plugin>
+                        <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+                        <executions>
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>initialize-basedirs</id>
+                                <phase>none</phase>
+                                <goals>
+                                    <goal>run</goal>
+                                </goals>
+                            </execution>
+                        </executions>
+                    </plugin>
+                    <plugin>
+                        <groupId>org.wildfly.plugins</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>wildfly-jar-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+                        <executions>
+                            <!-- Package a jaxrs-server layer with a few other layers -->
+                            <execution>
+                                <id>bootable-jar-observability-packaging</id>
+                                <goals>
+                                    <goal>package</goal>
+                                </goals>
+                                <phase>process-test-resources</phase>
+                                <configuration>
+                                    <output-file-name>jaxrs-server.jar</output-file-name>
+                                    <hollowJar>true</hollowJar>
+                                    <record-state>false</record-state>
+                                    <log-time>true</log-time>

+                                        <jboss-fork-embedded>true</jboss-fork-embedded>
+                                    </plugin-options>
+                                    <feature-packs>
+                                        <feature-pack>
